usa: Steve Jobs founded Apple Inc.<sup id="cite_ref-470" class="reference">[470]</sup>
Gregg v. Georgia: The Supreme Court affirmed that the death penalty did not violate the Eighth Amendment.[471]
United States Bicentennial: Americans celebrated the United States bicentennial.[472]
The Copyright Act of 1976 was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-473" class="reference">[473]</sup>
U.S. presidential election, 1976: Georgia Governor Jimmy Carter was elected President, defeating incumbent Gerald Ford.[17]
